title: Migration wizard for modular context setup
description: Add a step to ralph-setup wizard that helps users migrate their CLAUDE.md files to the modular context system. Uses scripts/context-migrate.zsh for analysis and optionally applies migration.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Add 'Context Migration' step to ralph-setup wizard
Wizard runs scripts/context-migrate.zsh to analyze current CLAUDE.md
Show estimated savings (lines moved to shared contexts)
Ask user if they want to apply migration
If no: show manual steps for later migration
Verify ~/.claude/contexts/ directory exists, create if missing
Copy missing context templates from ralphtools/contexts/ if needed
Wizard can skip this step with --skip-context-migration flag
Test: New user setup creates contexts correctly
Test: Existing user migration preserves project-specific rules
